Package soot.jimple.infoflow.solver

Class AbstractIFDSSolver<N,​D extends FastSolverLinkedNode<D,​N>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.jimple.infoflow.solver.AbstractIFDSSolver<N,​D>
  • Type Parameters:
    N - node
    D - data flow fact
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FlowInsensitiveSolver, IFDSSolver, IFDSSolver, IFDSSolver

extends Object
    Common superclass of all IFDS solvers.

    • Method Detail

      • setPredecessorShorteningMode

        public void setPredecessorShorteningMode​(PredecessorShorteningMode mode)
        Sets whether abstractions on method returns shall be connected to the respective call abstractions to shortcut paths.
        Parameters:
        mode - The strategy to use for shortening predecessor paths

      • shortenPredecessors

        protected D shortenPredecessors​(D returnD,
                                D incomingD,
                                D calleeD,
                                N currentUnit,
                                N callSite)
        Shortens the predecessors of the first argument if configured.
        Parameters:
        returnD - data flow fact leaving the method, which predecessor chain should be shortened
        incomingD - incoming data flow fact at the call site
        calleeD - first data flow fact in the callee, i.e. with current statement == call site
        Returns:
        data flow fact with a shortened predecessor chain
